    • Method Detail

      • resizeSpreadSheet

        public void resizeSpreadSheet(java.lang.String spreadsheetId,
                              int sheetId,
                              int columnSize)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Resize the column size of the provided sheetId in the google spreadsheet
        Parameters:
        spreadsheetId - unique id of the spreadsheet
        sheetId - the index of the sheet which is to be resized
        columnSize - the new column size of the sheet
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Providing sheetId or column size less than zero throws this exception Sheet Id is basically index of the sheet starting from zero Similarly, the value for the column size can't be negative
        java.io.IOException - Throws this exception if the google spreadsheet cannot be fetched due to insufficient permissions or invalid sheet id

      • getSheetCells

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> getSheetCells(java.lang.String spreadsheetId,
                                                                      java.lang.String sheetName)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches the spreadsheet with the provided spreadsheetId

        get(sheetId, range) method requires two parameters

        since we want to search the whole sheet so we provide only the sheet name as range

        range is in A1 notation eg. Sheet1!A1:G7

        For more info : https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/reference/rest/

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSpreadsheet

        public com.google.api.services.sheets.v4.model.Spreadsheet getSpreadsheet(java.lang.String spreadsheetId)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the selected google account has sufficient permissions to modify the given spreadsheetId. If yes, then returns complete spreadsheet otherwise throws exception
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
